version_description:
Thank you for using Easy ten! Today our app has become even better. Here is the list of new features and significant changes that we sheep with this update:

— The words you study are now grouped into thematics. If you want to learn all the words related to, for instance, fashion or business, you can just choose the desired group during words selection!
— Apple Watch support added. Soon you won't even have to take your phone out of the pocket. All the new words will appear on your watch display during the day. It is very handy, trust us on this :)
— Every noun in German language now has an article. It was difficult to determine grammatical gender, now it's not. Huge thanks to our users for pointing that out.
— Our linguists team has not forgotten to fix the english dictionary — we have added a "to" particle to every non-modal verb.
— Your favorite BrainBoost function does not crash anymore, supplying your brain with stable lingual workload!

   There are heaps of other slight enhancements — we made animations smoother and improved overall stability. We are constantly refining our product and glad that you are with us!

Easy ten team.

P.S. If you like Easy ten please spend 2 minutes of your time to rate the App.

4.6
Fixed a bug which caused app to freeze after the subscription purchase. If you have subscribed to easy ten and it hasn't been shown anywhere in the app, please, use the "Restore purchases" button in the Account section.
We sincerely apologize for inconvenience.

4.5
Thank you for using Easy ten! Today our app has become even better. Here is the list of new features and significant changes that we ship with this update:

— The words you study are now grouped into thematics. If you want to learn all the words related to, for instance, fashion or business, you can just choose the desired group during words selection!
— Apple Watch support added. Soon you won't even have to take your phone out of the pocket. All the new words will appear on your watch display during the day. It is very handy, trust us on this :)
— Every noun in German language now has an article. It was difficult to determine grammatical gender, now it's not. Huge thanks to our users for pointing that out.
— Our linguists team has not forgotten to fix the english dictionary — we have added a "to" particle to every non-modal verb.
— Your favorite BrainBoost function does not crash anymore, supplying your brain with stable lingual workload!

   There are heaps of other slight enhancements — we made animations smoother and improved overall stability. We are constantly refining our product and glad that you are with us!

Easy ten team.

P.S. If you like Easy ten please spend 2 minutes of your time to rate the App.

Thank you for using Easy ten! Today our app has become even better. Here is the list of new features and significant changes that we ship with this update:

— Fixed a bug when the app didn’t run on iOS 7 devices. Now it will.
— German articles were not displayed if you have updated the app - fixed!
— Some users reported crashes when they added words to the BrainBoost - this problem will not occur anymore. You can now train your brain with maximum intensity!

   There are heaps of other slight enhancements — we made animations smoother and improved overall stability. We are constantly refining our product and glad that you are with us!

P.S. If you like Easy ten please spend 2 minutes of your time to rate the App.

Thank you for using Easy ten! In the 4.8 version our app has become even better. Here is a list of new functions and significant changes we’re shipping with this update:

- BrainBoost has been improved with the added ”Today”, ”Yesterday” and ”Difficult” words subsections, which help you better structure your workflow.
- We have optimized the interface for the smaller screen of iPhone 4S
- BrainBoost progress is finally stored even when you quit the app!
- Language content has been refined manually — each word now has the most relevant and frequent translation.

Naturally, there are more enhancements than meets the eye — we have optimized navigation in the words learning section and improved the overall stability. We are constantly in the process of perfecting our app and we couldn’t be more happy that you’re with us!

Easy ten team.

P. S. If you like Easy ten, please take 2 minutes of your time and rate our app in App Store.

Thank you for using Easy ten! In the 4.9 version our app has become even better. Here is a list of new functions and significant changes we’re shipping with this update:


- Fixed double word audio playback when scrolling the feed too fast.
- Optimized the interface for iPhone 4 and 4s.
- Bonus days are now granted immediately after inviting your friends - so invite them, it's way more engaging to learn something new together!
- FAQ section added to the "Account" menu. It includes answers to the questions that frequently arise while using our app. This section also provides the ability to send a request directly to our support team and track the status of your requests.


Naturally, there are more enhancements than meets the eye — we have optimized navigation in the words learning section and improved the overall stability. We are constantly in the process of perfecting our app and we couldn’t be more happy that you’re with us!

Easy ten team.

P. S. If you like Easy ten, please take 2 minutes of your time and rate our app in App Store.

Fixed a crash that occurred​ when trying to access Settings
The work of the BrainBoost section has been improved
